What's a Pi-hole?

Pi-hole, as described on their site, is a black hole for internet advertisements / network wide ad blocker. These descriptions don't do this open source project justice and that's the motivation of this post. I'm going to dive into how I'm using a Raspberry Pi Model B+ 512MB Ram running pi-hole to do the following:

  • Block ads at the network level
  • Be a recursive DNS server
  • Expose an OpenVPN server in order to receive the aformentioned features while on the go
